Anyone interested, give me a shout and I'll put you in touch with Ryan ...

P

> -----Original Message-----
> Proinnsias, 
> 
> I'd be obliged if you could pass this along to all your Linux buddies....
> 
> For Sale:
> 	Power Computing PowerCurve
> (http://www.powerwatch.com/systems/pcurve.html)
> 	Original 120Mhz PPC-601 daughter card
> 	Slim Desktop case
> 	128MB RAM (new)
> 	2GB Apple (IBM) SCSI-2 HDD (new)
> 	Ati Rage Video card (new)
> 	4 x Speed Toshiba CdRom (used, not apple but driver hacked -
> available from web)
> 	keyboard & mouse (new)
> 
> 	Currently running MacOS9.1 (small partition) and Debian "Woody".  OK
> as is (think 
> 	Pentium 233ish) or ready for upgrade to G3-500 for some real
> performance!
> 
> 	Asking price EUR200, open to negotiation.
> 
> Regards, 
> Ryan
